sentences.en: But Mr Lafley's understated style masks a keen strategic mind and ambition.
sentences.cn: 不过,雷富礼先生的低调风格掩藏着敏锐的战略头脑和雄心壮志.

sentences.en: For a more understated look , try a shimmery tank under a cropped jacket a la Rihanna.
sentences.cn: 或者稍微低调些,像蕾哈娜一样在七分外套下穿件发亮的小背心.

sentences.en: I have always liked understated clothes — simple shapes which take a lot of hard work to get right.
sentences.cn: 我一直喜欢不太惹眼的衣服——简单的款式需要下大工夫才能弄得恰到好处。

sentences.en: I have always liked understated clothes.
sentences.cn: 我一向喜欢简朴的衣服。

sentences.en: My boyfriend looks pretty ordinary, but he's intelligent in an understated way.
sentences.cn: 我的男朋友长相平平, 但很内秀.

sentences.en: Pro: Brought a measure of understated competence to the war in Iraq.
sentences.cn: 让人们认识到了美军在伊拉克被低估的能力.

sentences.en: The crystals dangle on and refined chain to create a sensual movement and understated elegance.
sentences.cn: 水晶坠饰系于纤巧细致的饰链上,流露性感诱人、含蓄雅致的动感魅力.

sentences.en: The dangling crystals create a sensual movement and understated elegance.
sentences.cn: 水晶坠饰展现性感诱人、含蓄优雅的动感魅力.

sentences.en: The design is simple , elegant , understated yet sophisticated.
sentences.cn: 所诉求的消费对象以国际商务旅客及本地客人为主.

sentences.en: The dress reflects our signature style of understated elegance with a strong feeling of individuality.
sentences.cn: 这条裙子体现了我们所追求的低调优雅又有强烈个性感的独特风格。

sentences.en: The importance of a skillful music editor for a movie can not be understated.
sentences.cn: 一名熟练的音乐指导对于一部电影有不可低估的作用.

sentences.en: The melody, pure and understated , unfolds softly and pleasingly.
sentences.cn: 作品的旋律舒展柔美,委婉质朴.

sentences.en: The room is pleasant and understated.
sentences.cn: 这间屋子很舒适,很简朴.

sentences.en: the understated elegance of the Hotel Traiano
sentences.cn: 特拉亚诺酒店低调的优雅

sentences.en: The understated melody, the fluid rhythmical meter, the ingenious subtlety, together with random orchestration.
sentences.cn: 乐曲通过委婉的曲调, 流畅的节奏韵律, 巧妙细腻 、 配合错落的配器.

sentences.en: Thus at the start of this decade , when lay - offs peaked, it hugely understated true unemployment.
sentences.cn: 因此在世纪之初, 虽说失业率急剧上升, 它仍然低估了真实的失业水平.

words.tran_cn: 保守的陈述；不充分的陈述；有保留的陈述
保守地说；有意轻描淡写
少说，少报；保守地说；有意轻描淡写
低调的；朴素的；轻描淡写的；不夸张的

trans.tran_cn: 朴素的，简朴的，轻描淡写的，有节制的，低调的
trans.tran_en: an understated style is one that is attractive because it is simple and does not have too many decorations

trans.tran_cn: 没有充分地陈述实情(understate的过去式和过去分词)，少说，少报（某数目等），轻描淡写地陈述
